title: Why are the 22/7 - 25/7 replacing the 18/7 - 21/7 already?
body: I bought RP to buy Ahri before the new sale came out and the new rotation of sales replaced the ahri sale even though they aren't supposed to until tomorrow. Has it always been like this? Thanks in advance

replies.body:
Hey dude,

Thanks for reporting this.

The sales turned on at the right time, unfortunately the sales article from today had the wrong start date :( This has been updated.


The time listed in the Ahri article are correct:

> Sales will begin at 17:01 AEST on the 17/07 through 16:59 AEST on the 21/07.

So sorry about the confusion!
